text: Thomas Ernest "Satch" Sanders (born November 8, 1938) is an American former professional basketball player and coach. He played his entire professional career as a power forward for the Boston Celtics of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Sanders won eight championships. After his playing retirement, he was a head coach for the Harvard Crimson men's basketball team and the Boston Celtics. Sanders was added into the Naismith Basketball Hall of Fame in 2011. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Boston Celtics players Category:National Basketball Association coaches Category:Sportspeople from New York City Category:Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame inductees
title: Satch Sanders
